title: Pink Ward Yellow Trinket
body:
There is a bug with the pink ward yellow trinket that places down a pink ward with the improper ward skin than the one you have currently equiped...
i.e. I use snowman wards and the pink ward placed was one of the gargoyle wards from the pink ward of the upgraded yellow trinket

****

Slight oversight: Red Trinket 9+ is a 60 seconds cooldown, Oracle's is 60-->75 seconds cooldown; just saying Riot forgot to nerf 9+ Red Trinket along side the oracles

replies.body: FYI - I just had the same crash during URF game.
This happened to me too, I was using the rammus ward but the trinket put down the mecha ward which I don't even own.  Not sure if it's all vision wards or just the trinket
its the upgraded pink ward yellow trinket
Same here. I use the regular Poro wards from the Snowdown event. Today when i upgraded my totem and used it, it placed down a battlecast ward.
